name: asdf

subcommands.name: add
subcommands.description: Add a plugin from the plugin repo OR, add a Git repo as a plugin by specifying the name and repo url

subcommands.name: list
subcommands.description: List installed plugins. Optionally show git urls and git-ref

subcommands.name: all
subcommands.description: List plugins registered on asdf-plugins repository with URLs

subcommands.name: update
subcommands.description: Update a plugin to latest commit on default branch or a particular git-ref

options.description: Update all plugins to latest commit on default branch

subcommands.name: install
subcommands.description: Install all the package versions listed in the .tool-versions file

positionalArguments.name: <name>
positionalArguments.description: Install one tool at the version specified in the .tool-versions file

positionalArguments.name: latest[:<version>]
positionalArguments.description: Install the latest stable version of a package, or with optional version, install the latest stable version that begins with the given string

subcommands.name: uninstall
subcommands.description: Remove a specific version of a package

subcommands.name: current
subcommands.description: Display current version set or being used for all packages

positionalArguments.name: <name>
positionalArguments.description: Display current version set or being used for package

subcommands.name: where
subcommands.description: Display install path for an installed or current version

subcommands.name: which
subcommands.description: Display the path to an executable

subcommands.name: shell
subcommands.description: Set the package version to `ASDF_${LANG}_VERSION` in the current shell

subcommands.name: latest
subcommands.description: Show latest stable version of a package

subcommands.name: list
subcommands.description: List installed versions of a package and optionally filter the versions

subcommands.name: all
subcommands.description: List all versions of a package and optionally filter the returned versions

subcommands.name: help
subcommands.description: Output documentation for plugin and tool

tldr:
# asdf

> Command-line interface for managing versions of different packages.
> More information: <https://asdf-vm.com>.

- List all available plugins:

`asdf plugin list all`

- Install a plugin:

`asdf plugin add {{name}}`

- List all available versions for a package:

`asdf list all {{name}}`

- Install a specific version of a package:

`asdf install {{name}} {{version}}`

- Set global version for a package:

`asdf global {{name}} {{version}}`

- Set local version for a package:

`asdf local {{name}} {{version}}`
